text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Idiot... Are you dreaming about the<n>concert?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You two, it looks like they've brought<n>out dessert. Although,
Ticket already<n>seems to be out of fuel.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'll just go grab some cake for the<n>three of us. Taishin,
please continue to<n>keep an eye on Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, will do... I swear, Ticket. You're<n>like a preschooler,
running around till<n>you fall asleep...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Hey! Wake up! Get off of me!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hey, there... What are two youngins<n>like yourselves doing
sighing at a<n>party? Or, are you having another<n>"dreamland"
moment?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Exactly that... Being able to sing with<n>you, Teio, and even
Rudolf! It still<n>doesn't feel real.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
More than that, it was a lot of fun!<n>Again... I wish to do it
again and again!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: The stage lights were so, so bright, if<n>you ask me, but...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I figure so long as we keep running in<n>races, we'll be able
to go up there<n>countless times.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
What?! Nature is gonna sing with<n>Satono and the others
again! Not fair,<n>not fair! I wanna sing with them too!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: So do I... That's why we'll have to<n>keep running too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, that's right! Okay, then, let's<n>charge forward!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! What's gotten into you all of a<n>sudden?! That hurts!
Oof!
